ruleExplore.author:
<js>
if(baseUrl.endsWith("touzi/")||baseUrl.endsWith("dashenxinshu/")){
java.getString('td.1@a@text');
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("booklist/")){
java.getString('p.0@a.0@text||class.panel-heading.0@a.1@text');
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("bang/")){
java.getString('td.2@a@text');
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("shouding/")||baseUrl.endsWith("reader/")){
java.getString('td.3@a@text');
}
else if(/rongyao_[45]/.test(baseUrl)){
java.getString('td.4@a@text');
}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("twelvekings")){
java.getString('td.5@a@text');
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("www.qidian.com/")){
java.getString('class.author@a.0@text');
}
</js>
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
if(baseUrl.includes("bang/")){
java.getElements('@css:.panel-heading,tbody tr');
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("www.qidian.com/")){
java.getElements('class.book-img-text@li');
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("booklist/")){
java.getElements('class.panel panel-default&&class.well well-sm table-responsive')
}
else{
result=java.getElements('tbody@tr');
if(baseUrl.includes("badge/")){
result=['β'].concat(result);
}
result;
}
</js>
ruleExplore.bookUrl:
<js>
if(/rongyao_[45]/.test(baseUrl)||baseUrl.includes("shouding/")){
java.getString('td.1@a@href');
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("booklist/")){
java.getString('class.panel-heading.0@a.0@href');
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("bang/")){
java.getString('td.1@a@href||a@href').replace("/d","");
}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("twelvekings")){
java.getString('td.2@a@href');
}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("touzi/")||baseUrl.endsWith("dashenxinshu/")||baseUrl.includes("badge/")){
java.getString('td.0@a.0@href');
}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("reader/")){
java.getString('td.2@a@href').replace("/m","");
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("www.qidian.com/")){
"https://www.qidiantu.com/info/"+String(java.getString('h2@a@href')).match(/\d+/)[0];
}
</js>
ruleExplore.coverUrl:
<js>
function x(a) {
r="https://qidian.qpic.cn/qdbimg/349573/"+java.getString(a).match(/\d+/)[0]+"/180"
}
if(baseUrl.includes("booklist/")){
s=java.getString('class.panel-heading.0@a.0@href');	
if(s.startsWith("/booklister")){	r="https://gitee.com/lyc486/yuedu/raw/master/gex.webp"}	
else{	r="https://qidian.qpic.cn/qdbimg/349573/"+s.match(/\d+/)[0]+"/180"}
}
else if(result=="β"||String(result).startsWith("<div")){
	      if(baseUrl.endsWith("pindao")){nm="jp"}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("doujin")){nm="yz"}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("wanzi")){nm="wz"}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("longen")){nm="le"}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("yao_1")){nm="1x"}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("yao_2")){nm="2x"}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("yao_3")){nm="3x"}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("yao_4")){nm="4x"}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("yao_5")){nm="5x"}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("diyi")){nm="dy"}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("uipeng")){nm="zp"}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("yixin")){nm="yx"}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("uowan")){nm="sd"}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("vekings")){nm="se"}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("gbaofa")){nm="bf"}
else{nm="gex"}
r="https://gitee.com/lyc486/yuedu/raw/master/"+nm+".webp"
}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("twelvekings")||baseUrl.endsWith("reader/")){
x('td.2@a@href');
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("shouding/")||/rongyao_[45]|\d-\d/.test(baseUrl)){
x('td.1@a.0@href');
}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("touzi/")||baseUrl.endsWith("dashenxinshu/")||baseUrl.includes("badge/")){
x('td.0@a.0@href');
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("www.qidian.com/")){
x('h2@a@href');
}
r
</js>
ruleExplore.intro:
<js>
if(baseUrl.includes("booklist/")){
java.getString('class.panel-body.-1@p@html||class.panel-body@p@html');
}
else if(String(result).startsWith("<div")){
"⬇     ⬇\n： ⬇   ⬇\n：  ⬇ ⬇"
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("shouding/")){
r=java.getStringList('td.5@text&&td.6@text&&td.7@text&&td.8@text&&td.9@text');
"收藏:"+r[0]+",粉丝:"+r[1]+",收订比:"+r[2]+"\n首V时刻:"+r[4]+",首V字数:"+r[3];
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("bang/")){
result=java.getString('td.4@text&&td.5@text');
String(result).replace(/(\d.*)\s+(\d.*)/,"收藏:$1,粉丝:$2");
}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("touzi/")){
result=java.getString('td.4@text&&td.5@text&&td.6@text');
String(result).replace(/(\d.*)\s+(\d.*)\s+(\d.*)?/,"收藏:$1,推荐:$2,更新:$3");
}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("dashenxinshu/")){
result=java.getString('td.7@text&&td.4@text&&td.5@text&&td.8@text');
String(result).replace(/(\d.*)\s+(\d.*)\s+(\d.*)\s+(\d.*)?/,"粉丝:$1,收藏:$2,推荐:$3,更新:$4");
}
else if(result=="β"){""}
else if(/rongyao_[45]/.test(baseUrl)){
"粉丝数:"+java.getString('td.2@text')+"\n获得时间:"+java.getString('td.-1@text')
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("twelvekings")){
"粉丝数:"+java.getString('td.3@text')+"\n"+java.getString('td.1@text')+"年"
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("www.qidian.com/")){
java.getString('class.intro@text');
}
</js>
ruleExplore.kind:
<js>
if(result=="β"){
if(baseUrl.endsWith("pindao")){"VIP字数满20W字，被收录入精品频道"}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("doujin")){"单天获得100W起点币打赏"}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("wanzi")){"连续30天每天更新字数大于1W字"}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("longen")){"累计获得10000次打赏"}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("yixin")){"单天获得1W月票"}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("guowan")){"作品首个VIP章节订阅人数大于1W（24h）"}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("yao_1")){"荣耀一星"}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("yao_2")){"荣耀二星"}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("yao_3")){"荣耀三星"}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("yao_4")){"荣耀四星"}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("yao_5")){"荣耀五星"}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("diyi")){"曾经获得过单月月票榜第一"}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("uipeng")){"VIP字数满20W字，作品均订数据大于1W"}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("twelvekings")){"凭此作品入选网络文学榜样作家十二天王"}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("xiguanxingbaofa")){"正式章节10次以上日更万字"}
else{""}
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("booklist/")){
java.getString('class.panel panel-default@class.panel-heading@p.-2@text');
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("twelvekings")){
java.getString('td.2@ownText&&td.4@text');
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("shouding/")){
"首订:"+java.getString('td.2@text&&td.4@text&&td.1@ownText');
}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("touzi/")){
java.getString('td.2@text&&td.0@ownText').replace("()","");
}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("reader/")){
"排名:"+java.getString('td.0@text')+",盟主数:"+java.getString('td.1@text');
}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("dashenxinshu/")){
java.getString('td.0@ownText&&td.6@text&&td.2@text').replace("()","");
}
else if(/rongyao_[45]|\d-\d/.test(baseUrl)){
java.getString('td.1@ownText&&td.3@text');
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("badge/")){
"获得时间:"+java.getString('td.1@text')
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("www.qidian.com/")){
java.getString('class.book-img-box@span@text&&class.author@a[1,2]@text');
}
</js>##\[|\]
ruleExplore.name:
<js>
if(result=="β"){"荣誉徽章"}
else if(baseUrl.includes("booklist/")){
java.getString('h1@text||class.panel-heading.0@h4@text').slice(1,-1);
}
else if(baseUrl.endsWith("twelvekings")||baseUrl.endsWith("reader/")){
java.getString('td.2@a@text');
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("shouding/")||/rongyao_[45]/.test(baseUrl)){
java.getString('td.1@a@text');
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("bang/")){
String(java.getString('td.1@a@text||a@text')).replace(/^.*?-|-.{10}（点击查看推荐效果）/g,"");
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("badge/")||baseUrl.endsWith("touzi/")||baseUrl.endsWith("dashenxinshu/")){
java.getString('td.0@a.0@text');
}
else if(baseUrl.includes("www.qidian.com/")){
java.getString('div@h2@a@text');
}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
l=book.bookUrl.replace("www.qidiantu","book.qidian")+"/#Catalog";
r=java.ajax(l);
java.setContent(r);
le=java.getElements('.volume@h3');
re=java.getElements('@css:.cf li h2,.volume h3');
['<a n="书评" href='+book.bookUrl+'>'].concat(re)</js>
